value.title: StarCraft 2 - How Quickly Can SCARLETT Dispose Of Noobs? (PART 4/4) | Holdout Challenge
value.excerpt: We paid Scarlett to 1v1 noobs. The challenge: the noobs needed to stay in the match as long as possible while Scarlett did her best to cheese the heck out of them. We ended this challenge by putting her up against a GM player! This Holdout Challenge was a part of  PiG Sty Festival 2021.   Holdout Challenge

value.title: StarCraft 2: ~80 SUPPLY WIDOW MINE DROP! (TY vs soO)
value.excerpt: This game of StarCraft 2 includes the biggest Widow Mine drop I've ever seen at the professional level in SC2. Roughly 80 supply worth of Brood Lords and Corruptors goes up in a matter of seconds as TY comes in from the side with a massive Medivac flank. In this video I cast a long drawn out macro game
